channel.title: Selection on NOWHERESVILLE

item.title: Algorithms-Design and Analysis(Stanford) Notes
item.description: Divide and Conquer 分而治之 Master Method a “black-box” method for solving recurrences determine the running time for most of the D&C algos 3 cases Proof Interpretations Counting Inversions problem: counting # of inversions in an array measuring similarity between 2 ranked lists => making good recommendations => collaborative filtering Karatsuba Multiplication Problem: multiplication of two $n$-digit numbers $x, y$ simple method: $O(n^2)$ operations recursive method: $$ x = 10^{n/2}a+b, y = 10^{n/2}c+d, \text{ where }a,b,c,d\text{ are }\frac{n}{2}-\text{digit numbers} $$
